findings.title: Missing Content-Security-Policy header
findings.evidence: No Content-Security-Policy header present in response
findings.mitigation: Add a strict Content-Security-Policy header to reduce XSS risk

findings.title: Missing X-Frame-Options header
findings.evidence: No X-Frame-Options header present in response
findings.mitigation: Add X-Frame-Options or frame-ancestors to prevent clickjacking

findings.title: Server version disclosure
findings.mitigation: Disable or obfuscate server version headers
